remarks: Properties of a pair of functions to be a simple path between two given vertices(in an undirected graph).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 9-Mar-2018.)
statement: isspthonpth $p |- ( ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) /\ ( F e. W /\ P e. Z ) /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) ) -> ( F ( A ( V SPathOn E ) B ) P <-> ( F ( V SPaths E ) P /\ ( P ` 0 ) = A /\ ( P ` ( # ` F ) ) = B ) ) ) $.
